website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use and no chemical pesticides, this treatment is a solid choice for tackling lice.
pros: This treatment claims to kill "all variations" of lice, since development of resistant organisms is a common problem
Highly recommended by a large number of users
Treatment consists of a serum and comb
cons: A very small percentage claimed they still had lice remaining after treatment

customer_reviews.title: Better than the chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has very long, thick hair and we have been dealing with our first case super lice for about 4 months now...just when we think it's gone we find a bug or nit. The chemical treatments have not worked and burned my daughters skin. This treatment hasn't been a miracle cure but we feel better about doing multiple treatments because of the natural ingredients. It smells way better and doesn't burn her skin. The comb is much better than the ones that come with other kits. We are pretty pleased with this product overall and would use it again-but really hoping we don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: mnmr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Day one I felt like it worked. My home was basically new. Threw away pillows, washed everything with Lysol, steam cleaned, mopped and vacuumed apartment. Even the cell phones went into plastic bags. I said all that to say even with all the work I did, three days later lice were back. I used it again, again until bottle was empty. My childs lice was caught early from school teacher so it wasn't an infestation. No one else had it in my home. It worked a little but no cigar. Followed instructions to the T. I'm disappointed, will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting lice for the last 4 months and just when I think I’ve gotten them, one of my daughters comes home with another case. I’ve tried everything, even spending $400 at the professional lice salon. It’s driven me insane. I tried this tonight and it worked amazing!!! Every bug I pulled off their head was dead!!! I’ve never seen another product work this well, I always get a few live bugs after treatments. This product is wonderful, thank you thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ATAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product that works
customer_reviews.text: This product is very effective in killing lice. I didn't find a single crawler after treating my son's rather long hair. I'm not a huge fan of the scent, but it certainly smells better than most treatments you buy. It's also rather hard to wash out and can leave hair a little greasy. However, once you get it all out, hair is very shiney and soft. A huge improvement over the OTC chemical shampoos that leave your hair fried. I would 100% recommend this. It's a great product that works. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: julia wright

customer_reviews.title: Lice slaying like the pros!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! I had just combed through my daughters hair this AM! I used another comb and a top brand product! I was certain I had it ALL!! I combed for three hours this AM and just KNEW she was good...but I wanted reassurance since she “keeps” getting it...welll I gave this product a go! Smells great! Fooled the directions...then combed through and removed several bits and 28...yes TWENY EIGHT creepy crawlers 😳 HOLY MOLY! This comb is theeee best and this product is too! So glad I gave it a whirl! Hopefully this time we get rid of all these darn bugs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at all the positive reviews this product has gotten. My child got lice from school and I have used this product 3 times already with literally no difference in the quantity of lice. She is still scratching her head like mad and despite following the directions 100% it hasn’t yielded any results. I’m unhappy that my 25 dollars went down the drain and I have to spend more to buy another product which will hopefully work better.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Lifesavers and money savers
customer_reviews.text: This was my last option and considering what I've paid for previous treatments, that didn't work, this stuff, conditioner-cream, REALLY worked on my three children and their heads. This stuff was like a healing balm to those sores the lice cause. I used it twice in a week and two months later, we're still lice free. I totally bought a gallon but at least I'll have it if those suckers pop back up. So yeah, I'm a firm believer in this stuff. It smells good and is cheaper than other treatments, and it's safe enough to use on your kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Worked in 2 uses!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 6 year old who had a full infestation of head lice from kindergarten. The first application killed all the bugs and made the nits extremely easy to comb out. The instructions say to do treatments 7 days apart to catch any hatchlings from nits you may have missed. By the time I did the second treatment, there were no live bugs and the eggs appeared to be dead and empty and fell out of her hair too. Her head is completely clear! This treatment is easy and actually pleasant to use as it smells nice and softens the the hair. Will definitely keep this on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Did kill some but didn’t kill all lice and nits.
customer_reviews.text: Did kill some but not all lice and didn’t kill nits I’ve had so much trouble and have had to use this multiple times and it has been over a month. I’ve tried so many things. It smells good and does remove some but she just gets reinfected. It may have worked for some people but these super lice are tough and this just isn’t working for us.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Zawislak

customer_reviews.title: Good riddance after a month a lots of products!
customer_reviews.text: After battling my poor daughters lice for over a month I was distraught! We were all very traumatized by this... This product we used for 2 weeks every three days. We finally got them to go away for good. Her hair is almost to her butt so we’re talking about a lot of it!!!! It was easy to use, smelled good and not damaging. The comb was essential! It did take time though for some reason that’s the only reason I’m giving it 4 stars. Either way I’m grateful and very happy. I even used to prevent because I was so freaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Instant results!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, why didn’t I get this sooner??!! My kids have been battling lice all school year, and I’ve used Kroger’s over the counter lice treatment which has proven to be ineffective or these lice are totally resistant! I used this stuff tonight and it was immediately suffocating all the nits, they were dead on my hands while still rubbing in the treatment and I’ve never seen that before. Not only that, the comb that comes with it grabs ALL the buggers way more than the stupid OTC plastic comb! It also has a pleasant coconut smell!!! Thank you for making this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but it works as a preventative is you can get over your hair smelling like fruit candy
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve got long hair, you’re going to need a lot of the product, so go ahead and get the big bottle. The comb is great, too. You can comb the product out of your hair wet. I’m not sure how well it works, but we purchased this as a preventative measure. It smells like crushed sweet tarts. If you don’t mind a strong scent of fruity candy following you around, it beats destroying your hair with other options.
customer_reviews.author: Yesifounditonline

customer_reviews.title: Great, must try, smells good
customer_reviews.text: Have used this with the other products in this line. It is the nicest one I have found. It's hard to believe that it can get rid of lice after using other unpleasant products but we haven't had a problem since using them. Only thing I had a problem with was the tightness of the shower cap. It gave me a headache and red line on forehead, granddaughter didn't have as much problem as I did.
customer_reviews.author: BettyBoop

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us but the comb is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stuff but it didn’t work. However, the comb that comes with it is the best I’ve found yet. They got that part down. The product itself smells wonderful but it didn’t kill anything. I’d buy again just for the comb if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Save yourself months of tears and frustration
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly a miracle! I have been battling recurring lice infestations for several months. I have tried OTC medical shampoos, natural treatments, alternative methods and sometimes a combination of all 3 and NOTHING had left my daughter's hair lice AND Nit/egg free after 1 shot. This product did! I wish I would have discovered this months ago! I saturated her dry hair as recommended and about 30 minutes later, did not have her wash and rinse. We went straight to the comb through. All it took was a a few passthrough combings of each section and EVERYTHING was gone! Now I can shed tears of joy instead of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: mrsG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time dealing with lice in my house. We tried so much the first time around, & it was a crazy combo of five different products that seemed to help my girls (both with incredibly long, thick, curly hair!). When I noticed the girls itching again, I found this! I just had it on my oldest’s head for about 40 minutes, & the amount of lice I saw dropping out of her hair as I washed it was astonishing! I combed her hair and next to nothing was left! The added bonus is how wonderful the smell is!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever battled lice before you know the struggle to find a good product that really works. I was absolutely happy with this product! It is all natural, so it did not irritate my daughter's head. The smell was very pleasant compared to the chemical shampoos. My only complaint was it was a little difficult to get the creme all the way to the scalp and completely covering all the hair but the comb that came with it made up for that! It was amazing, it made combing out so much easier and cut down on the time spent doing it. Would highly recommend this product and will definitely buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I had been fighting with life for months. They would be all gone and then, bam find another. It was heck to comb my girls' hair. The comb would catch and it would hurt them. I used this product once. Combed with the provided comb and pulled out so many nits I had no idea were there! I waited about 8 days and did their hair again. No bugs since! This product is amazing and well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good scent
customer_reviews.text: Much better smelling than nasty stuff sold at stores for lice. Daughter's kept getting infested with lice from friend. No more sleepovers ! Does the job, good smelling, easy to use, and comes with comb and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cool mom

customer_reviews.title: The fastest resolution to anyone’s lice problem!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product! Me and my girls had been battling pesky lice for over a year and this was my last hope to tackle the problem. I did my girls hair once with this product and I have not had a problem since. ONE time use! They were completely gone! I was shocked at how this was our resolution for such a nightmare for over a year! If you have school aged children who are prone to the lice epidemic please do yourself and your wallet a favor and purchase this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ishak

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT ON MARKET
customer_reviews.text: This Head Hunter's Naturals Pro Lice Treatment Kit is a huge bottle and it works very well. It also smells great and leaves hair well hydrated and conditioned. It's the only treatment for lice I use on my kids and have also recommended it to some of their friends when there was an outbreak at their school.
customer_reviews.author: Nita in Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and is easy!! Get rid of lice for good!!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece has been battling lice for at least a year. The harsh chemicals have damaged her hair and left her with Super Lice that just won’t die. This product goes on like lotion and actually has a nice smell. They call it wipe out because the bugs along with the bits wiped right out of her hair after shampooing. The comb that comes with it works great to pull the left over bits out. I would recommend this to everyone and buy it again if I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Tritsarolis

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything for months. 3 girls hair down to mid back and longer on one also super super thick. Nothing touched the lice. Till we got this. Its definitely a one and done method. I bought extra just in case we needed to retreat but nope its sitting in case we get another case. Thanks head hunters!
customer_reviews.author: christa elliott

customer_reviews.title: Cherry smell
customer_reviews.text: So I used this product on my two daughters and it worked. I've used everything from OTC and prescription, none of it worked. We had been battling lice for about 2 years on and off. After this product we have been lice free for 4 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t kill lice
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do what it’s supposed to do and created a lot of scalp build-up aka flaming dandruff and when trying to comb out something like lice.. this is very messy considering the parasite is live still. !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Braun

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED IT!! After dealing for almost 2 weeks of combing and using chemical products on my daughters hair I bought this with high hopes and it did NOT disappoint. It smells great and the comb is awesome. I was able to get rid of them within a week of using this, each day seeing less and less (and mostly dead eggs).
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: A kid at school head lice, and the school notified us so I freaked out. I was reading reviews and decided to go with this one. Turns out my daughter didn't have any, but the product definitely smelled good and he was very easy to use, at this point I'm really not sure how effective it is
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic, it’s easy to apply and is not messy and does not drip, it’s a consistency of lotion. It smells really good and it’s easy to wash out. We managed to get out head lice which were refusing to leave, I tried 4 different lice removal before I bought this. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Charmin Arts and construction

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This product really seems to be working. It was enough to treat my children who have waist long hair, and myself, with enough left over to treat a second time. It detangles hair easily also and made the combing so much easier. I used mine in combination with a lice V-Comb.
customer_reviews.author: Fatallydisguised

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful & works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! It smells fantastic so it’s not a chore to use. the comb gets everything out. I will never purchase anything else if we catch that disgusting pest again
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing and smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great with 2 applications, where the name brand over the counter faimed after hundreds of dollars and multiple attempts. Product smells nice and leaves your hair soft after its battle abroad with the yucky buggers.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product that I hope we never have to use again!
customer_reviews.text: We’d been battling head lice for over a year-even went to a head center where I forked over $700.00+ to treat 4 heads and still not successful. This product finally did the trick! It is very easy to use and we have been lice free since our first treatment. We did comb hair like suggested every other evening.

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: This product saved our life’s.. with one treatment and combing it cleaned it all out. We have battled lice for a few years. And I was about to pay a professional and this saved us.. I definitely recommend buying.. and it smells so good.

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: ordered 2ed bottle arrived without the pump! Killed everything one shot...smells good no chemical smell, its like lotion. Its not hard to get out like other products
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: All around best lice product! After struggling with lice with my daughters for almost a year, buying everything on the market, trying all the silly wives tales and home remedies, I used this product once and that was all it took! We are finally lice free! I have happy little girls! Don't waste your money on anything else, this is the only good product out there!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This treatment is a life saver. It really works. My daughter got lice from school. I have tried 2 other products and they did not help. This one worked like a charm. Finally got rid off the lice for good! I used it only once and the results were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Naturally happy.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the scent and easy use. Works wonderfully. Just wish there were more for your buck. Comb was not as strong. Only survived one use.
customer_reviews.author: Ninfa

customer_reviews.title: it WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: My four year old has been dealing with lice for about 5 months now, so after multiple store lice products, I decided to shop and buy one online. I read the reviews and decided on this one. Two treatments later (with 4 days in between) and my daughter has been lice free so far! I haven't seen any lice or eggs after numerous brushing so far. I do recommend this product for anyone who has been having trouble getting rid of those pesky bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Dark

customer_reviews.title: Comb is great
customer_reviews.text: The product smells good. Bottle has misspelled word on back which made me nervous. In the end, the comb was fantastic. I believe any conditioner would work just like this product. To save $ just order the comb.

customer_reviews.title: Best lice treatment!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, after kids getting lice so many times from daycare and using store lice treatments over and over I had to try something new! Took them out of daycare for a week and got this! Worked the first time PERFECTLY!! No bugs or eggs after using the comb as well! Great stuff and my 3 year old didn't mind it at all!

The shampoo smelled great and worked well. He has very thick long soft hair. The comb was great. Metal. I still have half a bottle to keep incase.

After all the money I have spent on chemical treatments, and time and horror this stuff saved our lives!!

Although the second time I bought it it’s ingredients changed a little and now I am allergic to it- it now had coconut and mango in it...is there any way I could purchase the original one (industrial/family size) without the coconut and mango in it?

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing, I used this once and it killed all ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, I used this once and it killed all the head lice in my daughters hair. The comb that came with the bottle was perfect to scraping every little bug out. I wish I would of found this years ago. It also come with a cap to cover the head while the little buggers die. If you have a break out with head lice try. Don't bother with hash chemicals on your little ones, this is much easier too.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad that the teeth are close enough together to actually ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issues, as of yet. The only thing I would say against it is about the comb. When it's being pulled through my daughter's hair, it pulls her hair out. I'm glad that the teeth are close enough together to actually get even the nits out, but hair gets stuck at the lip over the teeth at the base. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it once so far and I've already seen results. It smells like Starbursts. The comb is a really great quality as well. I'd definitely recommend.
